title: Shamrock Foods Company DBA Gold Canyon Meat Company Recalls Raw Ground Beef Products  Due To Possible Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Nov. 15, 2021– Shamrock Foods Company, doing business as Gold Canyon Meat Company, a Phoenix, Ariz., establishment, is recalling approximately 6,876 pounds of raw ground beef patties because they may be contaminated with extraneous materials, specifically pieces of hard, white plastic, the U.S. Department...
impacted_products: approximately 6,876 pounds of raw ground beef patties
